Articles.Content:
I was using F12 cheats to test a lander in my career save and in the process completed a contract for a Duna flyby and World Firsts for Duna orbit, suborbit, flight, and landing. I was going to just revert the flight, but without thinking I used a quicksave and now I can't revert. I'm wondering if there's a way I can edit the persistence file to undo the contracts and associated funds/science/rep gain.

Here's the file, for reference: https://www.dropbox.com/s/fgnw1xgnjbvaib9/persistent.sfs?dl=0

 

Edit: Never mind, I figured it out.

Edited January 1, 2017 by KevinW42
